data.name: Floating Girl
data.detailed_description:
This is a "beautiful girl + hit the plane + choppy" combination of the game. You will encounter all kinds of beauties in space, some sexy, some cute, and some hot and passionate. With the downing of the plane, the beauties will meet you, and then...

It is said that a beautiful woman can stimulate a man's nature In order to get their attention, a man should use all kinds of methods to get their attention.

Game Features:
"Beautiful background music + choppy movements", easy to use, easy to gain favor. You can meet a beautiful woman right away.

Gameplay:
This is a flight shooting puzzle game, the game you need to control your plane, and then kill the local aircraft. Then you can slowly drop the image by killing the enemy. When you kill a certain enemy, you can fully see the beauty of the appearance! This game has a total of 16 girl CG, need to unlock slowly step by step!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game has some characters in sexual positions. Not suitable for all ages. Not suitable for watching at work. All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
